description:
Like the rest of the world, we’ve been deeply saddened and shocked by the events that are unfolding in Ukraine.

We're raising money for Save the Children, who are on the ground, ready to deliver life-saving aid to the children and families who have been forced to flee their homes. 

We've added a donation button to the checkout on our online store. Every little helps, and we'll match all your donations. 

You can find out more information about how Save the Children is supporting Ukraine in the link below 👇🏼

https://www.savethechildren.org.uk/where-we-work/europe/ukraine

A message from our Founders. ⁠
⁠
Today we urge you to turn your attention away from hair care. We want to take today to stand with the brave Ukrainian people in their fight to protect their homeland and the many Russian people that do not want war. Today on behalf of our consumer and professional stylist communities we are donating $25,000 to @savethechildren (www.savethechildren.org) a nonprofit providing children and families affected with immediate aid. ⁠
⁠
We stand in solidarity with Ukraine, its people and pray for peace.⁠
⁠
~ Greg & Joanne 💙💛⁠
⁠
⁠
#Ukraine #StopWarInUkraine #StandWithUkraine #HelpUkraine #SupportUkraine⁠

We’ll be donating 25% of our e-commerce profits during March to support @savethechildren efforts in Ukraine.

Strength for #Ukraine 🙏🏻🕊❤️

www.savethechildren.org

#Peace #Savethechildren #Savethechildrenworldwide #Chufy

If you are like us, watching and listening to the news as the devastation in Ukraine continues, wondering how you can help, don’t worry we’ve got a plan! 

Every online purchase this week, Thursday-Sunday will be donated to help those in need in Ukraine. Our donations will be sent through @savethechildren. You can learn more about how this incredible organization helps hundreds of thousands in need each year, how they are helping families in Ukraine and what else you can do to help on their ig page or website www.savethechildren.org.

We know the power of our awesome customers in this community and we thank you!! Let’s get our shop on and send some Foundry support to those who need us! Thanks friends ❤️

#foundryinterior #tellyourstylestory #savethechildern #helpukraine #everylittlebithelps

The 8-year conflict in Ukraine has now worsened. Without urgent de-escalation, the crisis will spiral out of control, with especially devastating consequences for children

I you are able to, please consider helping by supporting @savechildrenuk Emergency Fund today by following the link below (also in bio) or text CRISIS to 70008 to donate £5 Your donation will allow their teams to help children in crisis. 

https://www.savethechildren.org.uk/where-we-work/europe/ukraine

Here is what @savechildrenuk are doing in response… 

Save the Children has been operating in Ukraine since 2014. 

Currently, their teams are still able to respond - and will continue for as long as it is safe and possible to do so. They stand ready to scale-up their operations
 to ensure children impacted by this crisis have the support they need to get through this crisis. 

They are delivering essential humanitarian aid to children and their families. 

They are distributing winter and hygiene kits, providing cash grants to families so they can meet basic needs such as food, rent and medicine

They are supporting children to have access to safe, inclusive, quality education. 

They are providing children with psychological support to help them overcome the impacts of the conflict and violence on their mental wellbeing. 

🇺🇦 
#Ukraine #StopTheWarOnChildren
 #Ukrainecrisis

Support Ukraine Now! 💙💛

I stand with Ukraine! 🇺🇦

I can't stay away from what is happening in Ukraine.
In these last few weeks, I have been following the news to the minute and the violent actions of Russia against Ukraine are impossible to forgive.

I believe that no country and nationality in the world should be in a war conflict. We must unite and strive for peace because together we are stronger. The Ukrainian people have repeatedly proved this to us.

We must do whatever we can to help Ukraine.
For democracy, freedom, and the whole global world order.

Take action, spread accurate information, and help!

Help however you can and don't shut down, don't stay quiet and silent.

I have donated to the URGENT UKRAINE CRISIS: Help Kids in Need, which is managing to raise significant amounts of aid.

Here is the link:

https://donate.savethechildren.org/en/donate/emergency-ukraine?gclid=CjwKCAiAyPyQBhB6EiwAFUuakslwhLCpUt8PI3k-GKKD39EbSN3D3QvBR-34SA-5pkASxKK8tRIq9xoC_V0QAvD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds

Support Ukraine Now, this way or in so many other ways.

This link also shows ways you can help Ukraine as a foreigner:

https://supportukrainenow.org/

Support Ukraine Now!💙💛

#supportukraine #nowarinukraine #stopthewar #standwithukraine #saveukraine #closetheskyaboveukraine #nato #unitednations #peace

The Music Man on Broadway STANDS WITH UKRAINE!!!!!!!!!!!!!
If you are able to donate
Please consider

International Rescue Committee
https://www.rescue.org
 
VOSTOK SOS
https://vostok-sos.org/en/about/mission/
 
Save the Children
https://www.savethechildren.org

💙💛💙💛💙💛💙💛💙💛💙

Been feeling so saddened by everything we’re seeing/hearing about in Ukraine…. 🇺🇦🙏🏾 difficult to know what to say or do. But please know there are many ways to help. And the difference to children’s and their families’ lives is palpable and immediate. 

I’ve made a donation to @savechildrenuk and if you’d like to support them and their Emergency Fund to slow the effect of the war’s devastation … pls text CRISIS to 70008 to donate £5 Your donation will allow their teams to help children in crisis. 

There are SO many charities doing amazing work for the poor people affected.. if you can do anything read up, go on google, find the cause for you and be happy that we can help. Even a little bit 🥲 #Ukraine #StopTheWarOnChildren #Ukrainecrisis

https://www.savethechildren.org.uk/where-we-work/europe/ukraine

#westandwithukraine -- the words above and the following is a message from the IFM-SEI website:

Message from PeaceCommunicators - with the support of IFM-SEI Presidium

We here at the international seminar, PeaceCommunicators are working for Peace Education and to end violence. We are devastated by the recent invasion of Ukraine and the start of a war.

We call for international solidarity for those affected by the conflict, both those who are in danger from military violence and those whose safety is at risk while protesting and speaking up.

We condemn these attacks on Ukrainian sovereignty and democracy. We recognise that these actions are a threat to peace everywhere. ...

We stand for peace everywhere and against violence and oppression anywhere.

We send love and solidarity to all those affected by the hostilities.

What can you do:

SOCIAL MEDIA → Use #westandwithukraine in your social media posts and amplify the voices involved in and protesting against the invasion and expose the violations against Children’s Rights.

EDUCATE → Educate yourself about the situation and the impact of violence on Human Rights and Children’s Rights.

ADVOCATE → Get in touch with your representatives and encourage them to call for non-violence and a peaceful resolution of the conflict, and support anti-occupation legislation.

DONATE → If you have the means to show financial solidarity, make sure you are donating to those directly impacted.

Read more at https://ifm-sei.org/

🐞A note from Katy at Everyday Confidence Coaching

If you are seeking a place to donate, I personally trust / donate to these organizations:

☮️Save the Children - www.SavetheChildren.org
☮️International Committee of the Red Cross - https://www.icrc.org

Peace & Blessings.  Thank you for choosing love and sharing your own light in the world.

Third Mind shoes was created, in part , for its founders' concern for the plant and the world we will leave behind for our children. There is currently no bigger concern for us as a global community than the invasion of Ukraine. The ramifications of this war affects all of us. Millions of people in Ukraine are facing a dire situation which includes 1000's of children who are caught in the middle, either by hiding from shelling and bullets or finding themselves now without parents.

We as a company and individuals, want to do to what we can to help and stand with Ukraine

Third Mind is donating to https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine In addition, we will be donating $20 dollars of every pair of shoes sold to support Ukraine.

#wearethirdmind #classicsreimagined #ThirdMind #LookDoFeelGood

@savethechildren www.savethechildren.org
Humanitarian aid for displaced children due to wars and other crisis. 🇺🇦. Non profit. It’s an emergency.

Nike **PRO UKRAINE** 
(3-PW), bright chrome, @bbandfco ferrules

100% of PROCEEDS FROM THIS SALE OF 100% mint condition, fully restored @nikegolf CLUB HEADS WHICH INCLUDE FERRULES AND PAINT IN THE UKRAINE FLAG’s COLORS WILL GO TO HELP THE UKRAINIAN PEOPLE.

WE WANT TO MAKE SURE THERE IS NO MISUNDERSTANDING….WE DID NOT RESTORE AND DESIGN THESE IRONS WITH The Ukrainian FLAG’S COLORS FOR THIS PURPOSE. WE PUT THESE UP FOR SALE SEVERAL WEEKS AGO AND CHOSE THE FERRULES AND COLORS BC THEY MATCHED A PAIR OF CLASSIC AIR JORDAN SHOES. BUT NOW, WE WERE EITHER GOING TO PULL THE SET DOWN OR DO THIS. WE CHOSE THIS. 

$5000 - Full Set donation 
$2500 - either half set - odds or evens -  donation (while possible, we only have one set)

The money will go to the Ukrainian Crisis Relief Fund, which has been set up by the Save the Children organization. 

https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine

TO BE CLEAR, WE ARE NOT DONATING PROFITS, WE ARE DONATING 100% OF THE SALE PROCEEDS.  TC IS DONATING THE IRONS AND WORK WE DID ON THEM. YOU ARE BUYING THE IRONS AT AN OBVIOUSLY HIGH PRICE AND IN THE PROCESS MAKING A DONATION SO WE CAN HELP JUST A BIT MORE.

1/2 SETS ARE AVAILABLE WHILE POSSIBLE SO A SMALLER DONATION IS POSSIBLE.

THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR HELP.

WE HAVE LEFT THE ORIGINAL WRITE UP ON THE SITE, BUT REMOVED THE PICTURE OF THE JORDANS.

—————-

Wisconsinites can aid #Ukraine and its citizens through numerous different organizations that need your financial support. Here are a list of organizations that you can support:

🇺🇦 7.5 million Ukrainian children and their families are witnessing this war. Save the Children has been operating in Ukraine since 2014, delivering humanitarian aid to children. 

Support Save the Children US: https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine 

🌻 Sunflower of Peace is currently providing first aid and medical backpacks for Ukrainian doctors and medics. These backpacks are vital when it comes to lifesaving measures on the frontlines.

Support Sunflower of Peace: https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com/ 

🇺🇦 International humanitarian organization CARE has set up an emergency Ukrainian Crisis Fund that will assist in providing basic needs, with an emphasis on supporting women, girls, families, and the elderly.

Support CARE: https://my.care.org/site/Donation2?df_id=31067&mfc_pref=T&31067.donation=form1&s_src=172220UCF000&_ga=2.12731191.1845375364.1645809248-1107661317.1645809248 

📰 The Kyiv Independent (The Kyiv Independent) launched as Ukraine’s premier source for English journalism three months ago and has been reporting on the frontlines. 

Support their journalism here: https://www.gofundme.com/f/kyivindependent-launch

Spirit Jersey® will donate $64 from every "I Stand with Ukraine" Spirit Jersey® purchased to Save the Children's Ukraine Crisis Relief Fund. This support can provide children and their families with immediate aid and necessities to help them stay safe during this crisis.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Spirit Jersey® believes in a culture fostered by peace through community involvement and encouraging positive actions. Peace requires contribution from us all. To learn more about Save the Children's Ukraine Crisis Relief Fund, visit www.savethechildren.org.

#StandForUkraine
Help for refugees, asylum seekers and those affect by war around the world:
◇ https://www.unhcr.org/uk/get-involved.html
◇ https://www.savethechildren.org.uk/how-you-can-help
◇ https://www.redcross.org.uk/about-us/what-we-do/how-we-support-refugees

Unfortunately, many kids lost their homes and parents during this awful time. 
Here is how you can support
Save the Children: This group is raising money for the millions of Ukrainian children who are in grave danger of physical harm, severe emotional distress and displacement following an escalation in hostilities overnight. They provide food, blankets, and emergency shelter tools to children and their families. They are taking donations via their website portal. https://support.savethechildren.org
 
UNICEF.  https://www.unicefusa.org 

Also, if you are interested in adoption I can help you with all logistics and connect with our organizations.

Hey guys, I have one more new track to share with you. It is called ‚Shimmering Illusion‘ and it‘s part of the lovely compilation ‚Rust‘ on the Beirut based label @systemrevival . 100% of proceeds goes to www.savethechildren.org

I never thought my generation would be a War Generation, But, every day I think, how can I be ready, can I become a soldier?
Art loses its meaning when bombs are falling from the sky. When there is war, you face great evil and it is difficult to be peaceful and humble.
I believe a generation will be born that will never see WAR again!

Available for free download, however, your donation can really make some difference: www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine
You could buy at any price on bandcamp LINK IN BIO

All my support to Ukraine

Released on @ces_records

Ukraine is the second-largest country in Europe, after Russia, and has an estimated population of 44 million. Sadly, children in Eastern Ukraine have grown up in conflict for the past eight years, enduring violence, shelling and being displaced from their homes. Today, fighting in Ukraine has forced children and families to seek refuge in neighboring countries, with more than 3 million people having now crossed the borders.
Ukraine’s children are caught in the crossfire of this war. 
@SavetheChildren has been operating in Ukraine since 2014, delivering essential humanitarian aid to children and their families. Your donation to the Children's Emergency Fund can help provide children and families impacted by the conflict in Ukraine with immediate aid, such as food, water, hygiene kits, psychosocial support and cash assistance.
Head to savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine or swipe up on our story to donate.
#WeStandWithUkraine

Like millions of people around the world, we’re appalled by the ongoing crisis unfolding in Ukraine. We do not have any students from the impacted regions on our program. We’re of course continuing to closely monitor the situation.⁠
⁠
With our focus on working with youth to enable them to discover themselves and evolve, we are extremely heartbroken to see what the children of Ukraine are going through. We’re now joining the world in support of Ukraine through Save the Children, donating an amount equivalent to a full-year high school exchange. ⁠
⁠
Everyone, everywhere, should have an unequivocal right to peace, safety, and freedom. Let’s all pray for a soon end to this atrocious situation.⁠
⁠
Please join us in supporting Save the Children. They are actively helping children both in Ukraine, along the borders, and in the receiving countries.⁠
⁠
https://www.support-savethechildren.org/donate⁠
⁠
⁠
⁠
⁠
⁠
@savethechildren @raddabarnen ⁠#highschoolexchange #exchangeyear #highschoolabroad #goabroad #highschool #discoveryou #räddabarnen #savethechildren

$20 dollars from each sale of Third Mind shoes is being donated to assist the needs of children in Ukraine 

Third Mind stands with Ukraine 

https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine

#wearethirdmind #classicsreimagined #ThirdMind #LookDoFeelGood #ukraine

The reality of what’s happening in Ukraine has deeply affected so many of us, and all our thoughts are with the very people living through this horror.

We have Ukrainian members within our community, members with family in Ukraine, as well as team members who are in border countries witnessing the incredible humanitarian efforts taking place.

What’s happening is utterly heartbreaking and it goes without saying that we stand in solidarity with Ukraine and hope for a peaceful resolution as soon as possible.

As a supportive and compassionate community, we know many of us want to know how we can do more and offer our support.

As a business community, it’s unimaginable to not only have your life turned upside down, but to also have your livelihood and business that you have worked so hard to build disrupted as well. 

We know just how much heart and soul goes into all the amazing women-owned businesses around the world, which is why we wanted to share ways that we can all directly support Ukrainian businesses, and the women behind those businesses, at this time. 

Here are a few businesses through which you can support Ukrainian entrepreneurs: 

• Support Sellers in Ukraine (Etsy page, digital sellers)
• HappySpacesWorkshop
• Artliciousness
• MisTeryPlace
• CalligraphyByAnnY
• VividStitchShop
• StitchyPrincess
• Drawiind
• DigitalNastasiaArt
• AirBnB 

(URLs are all shared in our latest blog post, see our recent IG Story for the direct link)

As well as supporting businesses, if you’re in a position to donate, these are a few charities providing humanitarian relief:

• Red Cross (https://help.rescue-uk.org/ukraine-crisis)
• Disaster Emergency Appeal (https://www.dec.org.uk/appeal/ukraine-humanitarian-appeal) 
• Save the Children (https://www.savethechildren.org.uk/how-you-can-help/emergencies/ukraine-appeal)
• Choose Love (https://donate.chooselove.org/campaigns/ukraine-appeal) 
• The Pachamama Project (https://www.thepachamamaproject.org/index.html#welcome) – period poverty in war

It’s a scary time and our hearts are with all those suffering, but together we can all play a small part in supporting the people of Ukraine. 

💙💛

Henry, a student at Tuscaloosa Magnet Schools-Elementary is organizing a one mile fun run/walk to benefit children of Ukrainian refugees. The fund provides immediate aid for displaced families in the form of food, water, hygiene kits, psychosocial support, and cash assistance. Check out this website for more information.
http://support.savethechildren.org/goto/RaceforPeace.
The race is set for Saturday, April 23rd on the Riverwalk. Registration begins at 8am, and the race will begin at 8:30am.
